        public org.mini2Dx.gdx.utils.Array<GamePad> getGamePads()
        Description copied from interface: Input
        Returns the list of known GamePads connected to the device. If a GamePad disconnects/unplugs it will remain in this array.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
